intro: Eriocaulon zyotanii, commonly known as the slender spike-rush, is a flowering plant belonging to the family Eriocaulaceae. It is a small, herbaceous perennial that typically grows in wetland or marshy environments. The plant features a dense, compact rosette of narrow, grass-like leaves. Its inflorescence consists of a spike of tiny, greenish flowers surrounded by bracts. Eriocaulon zyotanii is often found in tropical and subtropical regions, where it thrives in moist, nutrient-rich soils.
